title: uLoL registration for the next academic year
body: Hi. I am the president of my university's eSports club and will be taking over as uLoL President as well. I was wondering when the club registration for the next academic year of uLoL would begin. Additionally, can I use my account to sign up the club or do I have to ask the former president to transfer over the power to me somehow?

replies.body:
I want to make sure you get all these questions properly, and answered quick enough to get your registration going. Since I don't have all the details myself, let's get you in touch with the people who do. 

Shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and pick the first option from the drop down menu. Once we pick up the ticket, we can get it to the right people who will be able to answer any other questions you might have too!
Thank you I just did that!
